desc: Florida-based merchant cash advance provider offering up to $1.5M in business funding with a 95% approval rate. BBB accredited with an A+ rating, providing cash in as little as 24 hours without collateral or excessive paperwork.

Merchant cash advance funder providing capital to merchants and business owners, specializing in revenue-based financing. Headquartered in New York with Florida operations, offering funding within 24-72 hours with revenue estimated at $5-10M.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.
Merchant cash advance provider offering working capital solutions suitable for a broad spectrum of industries and financial needs, with expert advisors known for industry knowledge.
Small business funding company based in Florida. Limited public information available about their specific products and services.
Gemini Business Funding provides merchant cash advances, revenue-based financing, business loans, and lines of credit to help small businesses access working capital regardless of credit issues.
New York-based merchant cash advance and small business funding company. Limited public information available about their specific offerings.
Kentucky-based business funding company offering merchant cash advances with money available within 48 hours. Serves as a merchant funding partner for small businesses seeking working capital.

California-based merchant cash advance provider with 15 years of experience, offering customized and flexible MCA loans with funding in 24-48 hours. Works with businesses with FICO scores as low as 500 using soft-pull credit checks.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

Florida-based merchant cash advance provider that offered revenue-based financing with funding ranging from $750K to $2M. Per BBB records, the business may be out of business as of 2023, having originally started in 2015.
Private funding firm providing working capital to businesses nationwide with a simple one-page application, no upfront costs, approvals under 24 hours, and funding in less than 48 hours.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

Online business lender (part of Enova International, NYSE: ENVA) offering unsecured business lines of credit up to $100K. Trusted by 5,000+ business owners with transparent terms and next-business-day funding, requiring minimum 1 year in business and $50K+ revenue.

Florida-based alternative lender founded in 2019 offering construction loans, bridge loans, merchant cash advances, term loans, lines of credit, equipment financing, and invoice factoring. BBB accredited since 2020, focused on transparent lending to small and middle-market companies.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances and business funding. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company also known as East Hudson Capital, operating under Global Capital Experts. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.

MCA marketplace/broker that helps small businesses find merchant cash advance options and avoid predatory lenders. Connects businesses with multiple MCA offers and provides funding within 24-48 hours.

Full-service private lending company founded in 2011 providing small business financing alternatives to traditional bank loans, including merchant cash advances and marketing services. Uses over 20 in-house underwriters and approves based on business performance rather than credit score.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company offering corporate funding solutions. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company offering funding solutions. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

New Jersey-based merchant cash advance provider with a 90% approval rate, offering funding via factor rates of 1.14-1.48. Provides capital within 24 hours with flexible repayment based on business sales volume and no collateral required.

Professional direct lender based in New Haven, CT providing working capital and equipment financing to businesses of all sizes. Serves retail, manufacturing, healthcare, and construction industries with transparent and efficient financing processes.
Tennessee-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about their specific merchant cash advance offerings.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Merchant cash advance provider offering $10K to $2M in working capital to small and medium-sized businesses with approval in 24 hours or less. Claims an 80% loan approval rate with flexible repayment options.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances under the Kash Advance brand. Limited public information available.
Massachusetts-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.
Missouri-based merchant cash advance provider offering fast and flexible MCA financing solutions for small businesses with approvals in 24-48 hours.

New York-based direct funding company providing small businesses with fast access to capital. Merged with Kalamata Capital in 2018, with the combined entity providing approximately $300M in capital annually to over 5,000 small businesses.

New York-based merchant cash advance provider located at 40 Wall St (Trump Building), offering business cash advances without collateral. Provides dedicated funding managers and flexible terms with funding in as little as 24 hours.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Digital marketplace bank (NYSE: LC) and SBA Preferred Lender offering small business lending products including SBA 7(a) and 504 loans starting at $400K. Trusted by 5,000+ business owners, previously facilitated $870M in PPP loans during the pandemic. Part of Enova International's portfolio.
Kentucky-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about their specific merchant cash advance offerings.
Brooklyn, NY-based merchant cash advance provider offering business funding through future credit card receivable purchases. Known for quick approval and simple application process.

Embedded merchant cash advance program built into Lightspeed POS system, allowing eligible merchants to request cash advances directly from their back office. Expanded internationally to UK, Australia, New Zealand, and Quebec with automatic monthly eligibility reviews.

Memphis, Tennessee-based merchant cash advance provider specializing in funding up to $50K for small businesses across the US and Puerto Rico. Offers same-day funding with easy application and minimal paperwork.
Florida-based small business lending company. Limited public information available about their specific products and services.
Small business lending company operating under the GetLoot brand. Limited public information available.

Revenue-based finance company providing working capital to US small businesses. Customer service-oriented funder with qualification requirements of 6 months in business and $10K monthly revenue, advancing up to 75% of monthly gross sales.

Fort Lauderdale, Florida-based small business financing company offering comprehensive solutions including lines of credit, term loans, merchant cash advances, equipment financing, property loans, and invoice factoring.

New York-headquartered business funding company offering merchant cash advances, invoice advances, property-based funding, and equipment financing. Provides non-obligated quotations based on 3 months of business bank statements.
New York-based merchant cash advance provider offering nationwide fast loans to small businesses. Limited public information available about specific funding terms.

New York-based business lender offering merchant cash advance refinancing, business loans, and lines of credit. Provides MCAs with no collateral requirement and repayment through daily credit card receipts or fixed ACH debits.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

Valley Stream, New York-based business financing company offering same-day working capital approvals up to $2M. Provides term loans, SBA loans, factoring, asset-based lending, lines of credit, equipment financing, and merchant cash advances.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances and business funding. Limited public information available.

New York-based company providing small business funding, marketing, and merchant services. Offers lines of credit, invoice factoring, equipment financing, and merchant cash advances from $5K to $500K. Founded by Anthony Frisone.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

Business lender offering unsecured term loans from $75K to $500K with rates starting at 8.99% and same-day processing. Specializes in MCA refinancing into longer-term, lower-payment structures. BBB A+ rated with no upfront or application fees.
England-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about their specific MCA offerings.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

Utah-based small business financing company with decades of experience, offering term loans, lines of credit, equipment financing, and working capital advances. Works with banks through a Bank Alliance Program to serve clients they cannot reach.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.

New York-based merchant cash advance provider offering working capital, MCAs, equipment leasing, small business loans, and factoring. Has helped hundreds of clients with tailored financing solutions accommodating varying cash flows.
Small business lending company. Note: peoplefund.org may be a different entity (PeopleFund is a Texas-based CDFI). Limited public information available about PEOPLEFUND ADVANCE specifically.
Boutique business financing firm based in Indiana that leverages management team's small business ownership experience to provide customized, out-of-the-box financing options for clients.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

AI-powered financing platform for small businesses founded in 2018, based in Greenwood Village, CO. Offers revolving access to $10K-$1M in funding with flexible repayment options (fixed weekly or revenue percentage). Also provides embedded finance/credit-as-a-service to banks and B2B companies.

Texas-based business funding company offering merchant cash advances, asset-based loans, business term loans, and factoring receivables. Provides customized funding solutions for business expansion, equipment upgrades, and growth opportunities.

Direct lender providing small business loans, refinancing, and merchant cash advances from $20K to over $1M with funding in as little as one business day. Requires 6+ months in business, 500+ credit score, and $100K+ trending annual revenue. All loans funded with company assets, no outside investors.

BBB A-rated direct lender providing flexible cash advance programs for small and medium businesses from $5K to $250K+. Offers 4-hour approvals with same-day funding, competitive programs for merchants, and up to 16 points commission for ISO partners.

Brooklyn, NY-based merchant cash advance provider with 20+ years of combined experience, offering $10K to $2M in funding. Purchases credit card receivables with 24-48 hour funding, no collateral required, and no penalties or surcharges.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Fort Lauderdale, FL-based direct merchant cash advance lender providing fast working capital and revenue-based financing for small and midsize businesses. Offers approvals in as little as 2 hours for up to $2M with funds typically clearing within 24 hours.
New York-based small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available about specific terms and offerings.

New York-based merchant cash advance provider founded by Simon Wein, offering same-day approvals with 24-hour turnaround. Purchases future business receivables and has helped hundreds of businesses access funding for expansion, inventory, and hiring.

New York-based funding company using advanced technology and rigorous underwriting to approve businesses across a variety of industries. Provides a funding platform for businesses across America with affordable and time-efficient products and services.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

Business funding provider offering working capital loans, SBA loans, revolving lines of credit, and invoice factoring. Provides swift and straightforward funding solutions with online applications processed in minutes.
Small business lending company. May include two entities: Rival Funding and Robin Funding Group. Limited public information available.

New York-based business financing company launched in 2009, offering term loans, lines of credit, merchant cash advances, SBA loans, commercial loans, factoring, and business credit development. Claims to have facilitated over $1B in capital with 15+ financing options.
Small business financing company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Washington state-based merchant cash advance provider with 12+ years of financial lending experience. Grew from $600K to $10M in gross annual funding with a default rate of 5-10%. Licensed in California and Washington.
Florida-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
California-based merchant cash advance provider. Limited public information available about specific products and terms.

New York (Sheepshead Bay)-based direct MCA funder offering B-C paper in the $10K-$500K range with terms up to 12 months. Provides same-day funding up to $500K with syndication and white label options for ISOs, and early payoff discounts.

New York-based small business financing provider offering Total Deposit Advance (TDA) and Credit Card Advance (CCA) products. Senior management team has 30+ years financial services experience with nearly two decades in cash advance specifically. Funds businesses regardless of credit.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances (not to be confused with Snap Finance). Limited public information available.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
New Jersey-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company operating as Swift Advance Partners. Limited public information available.

New York-based true direct MCA funder providing critical financing to small and medium-sized businesses. Offers up to $1M in funding with 3-hour approvals and 24-hour funding, working closely with brokers and ISOs with up to 16 points commission and next-day payouts.
Small business lending company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

North Carolina-based Community Development Financial Institution (CDFI) providing small business loans from $500 to $100K, focused on businesses owned by people of color, women, low-income, and rural individuals. Note: As of May 2024, not accepting new loan applications during strategic assessment.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Small business lending company offering financial services. Limited public information available.
New York-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

New York-based fintech (99 Wall St) providing quick financing for small businesses across US and Canada. Offers lines of credit, fixed term loans, and merchant cash advances from $10K to $5M, targeting businesses with 3+ months of operation and $200K+ annual revenue.

New York-based (Farmingville) small business funding company with 20+ years in operation, providing merchant cash advances and small business loans from $2K to $2M. Requires minimum 1 year in business and $10K monthly sales.

Florida-based small business funding company. Limited public information available; note that Value Capital Funding (a separate entity in Boca Raton) specializes in MCA debt relief, which may be a different company.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Small business financing company. Limited public information available.
Merchant cash advance provider that purchases a percentage of future credit card sales and provides immediate cash advances to businesses that accept credit and debit card payments.

Flushing, New York-based fintech founded in 2021 providing revenue-based financing and merchant cash advances from $1K to $250K within 24 hours. Also offers commercial real estate funding and marketplace services across US and Canada, with no personal guarantee requirement.

Atlanta-based commercial finance company founded in 2020 specializing in factoring and ledgered lines of credit from $10K to $1M. Advances 80-90% of invoice face value, targets businesses with $250K-$15M annual revenue. Leadership has 50+ years experience processing $600M+ in invoice volume annually.

New York City-based merchant cash advance provider founded in 2009, offering advances from $4K to $150K to SMEs across North America. Serves food, retail, automotive, health, beauty, bar, medical, and education sectors with typical repayment of 8-12 months.

Salt Lake City, Utah-based merchant cash advance provider founded in 2009, specializing in quick working capital access for small businesses. Uses a purchase-and-sell agreement structure with repayment based on a fixed percentage of daily card transactions, with flexible terms and no collateral required.

Miami, Florida-based revenue-based financing provider offering working capital loans, merchant cash advances, and equipment financing to small businesses. Funds a wide range of industries with funding available in as little as 60 minutes, requiring minimum $4K monthly revenue and 550+ credit score.
Small business funding company. Limited public information available about their specific merchant cash advance offerings.
Merchant cash advance ISO (Independent Sales Organization) that partners with funders to help businesses access capital. Operates as a broker/intermediary in the MCA space.
Brooklyn, NYC-based growing alternative financing company specializing in merchant cash advances nationwide as a direct funder. Customizes financial solutions with agility for small businesses.
Lincolnwood, Illinois-based merchant cash advance provider offering ISO partnerships and MCA services to small businesses.
New Jersey-based merchant cash advance provider offering partner/ISO programs for brokers. Limited public information available about specific funding terms.

New York-based pioneer in alternative lending providing merchant cash advances and business financing to small business owners across the United States. Offers customized financial plans and partner programs for ISOs.

Virginia-licensed financial services provider founded in 2021, specializing in merchant cash advances for small and medium-sized businesses. Achieves 89.2% same-day funding rate with no collateral required and lower credit score requirements starting around 500.
Florida-based merchant cash advance provider offering ISO partnership programs. Limited public information available about specific funding amounts and terms.

Fort Lee, New Jersey-based small business lender operating since 2001, providing affordable merchant cash advances, unsecured term loans, and small business loans. One of the country's leading small business loan providers focused on affordable alternatives to traditional bank lending.

New York-based high-risk direct funder for small business owners seeking immediate cash flow. Offers daily, weekly, and hybrid repayment options with 30-minute offers and same-day funding. Specializes in businesses with past defaults, poor credit, or over-leveraged situations.
